text: niṅṅaḷ strīkaḷe vivāhamēācanaṁ ceytiṭṭ avaruṭe avadhi prāpiccāl avar taṅṅaḷuṭe bharttākkanmārumāyi vivāhattil ērpeṭunnatin niṅṅaḷ taṭas'samuṇṭākkarut‌; maryādayanusaricc avar an'yēān'yaṁ tr̥ptippeṭṭiṭṭuṇṭeṅkil. niṅṅaḷil ninn allāhuviluṁ antyadinattiluṁ viśvasikkunnavarkkuḷḷa upadēśamāṇat‌. atāṇ niṅṅaḷkk ēṟṟavuṁ guṇakaravuṁ sanśud'dhavumāyiṭṭuḷḷat‌. allāhu aṟiyunnu. niṅṅaḷ aṟiyunnilla
